c74object.name: zsa.mfcc~
c74object.digest: Outputs Mel-frequency cepstral coefficients as a list.
c74object.description:
zsa.mfcc~
Computes Mel-frequency cepstral coefficients from signal. The object works in the spectral domain, so you need to use it whithin
pfft~
.

inlet.name: INLET_NAME
inlet.digest: not connected, you might wanna do something about that;-)

inlet.name: INLET_NAME
inlet.digest: not connected, you might wanna do something about that;-)

method.name: (mouse)
method.description: Double-clicking on the object causes the Zsa Descriptors splash screen to appear. You'll find the version number and date there.

method.name: signal
method.description:
If both signal inlets are connected, left signal inlet expects real values and right inlet expects imaginary values. If the left inlet is the only signal connected input, the signal is interpreted as the energy (you need to calculate it using
cartopol~
or better
zsa.energy~
).

attribute.name: fbe
attribute.description:
When
fbe
attribute is set to 1 (default = 0), the first item of the processed list will be positive and represents the energy.
